entry.title: Behold
entry.summary:
Author: Loric Bard (Chanonvic)

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,307Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: Although I have been with the Child since he called himself my name, he has not heard me before he awakened from near death in the arms of his beloved.Take heed, dear Child: I am the one who glides on the night, first known by the Kryptonians and now hallowed throughout the galaxy. Though I have many followers, I have few Children. I am NightWing.A chill sweeps through the Child. He tries to hide it."What do you want?" he repeats. His voice is small.I have only ever wanted one thing. I want what he wants.---Dick thinks he knows more than the voice in his head. That is, until he faces the prospect of losing Jason forever.¬† The WIP formerly known as Dick starts hearing voices

entry.title: What we should've said.
entry.summary:
Author: redwingz

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,712Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 4

Summary: "I can't keep doing this with you.""Doing what?""Pretending like we don't mean something to each other."Richard Grayson is a natural born-leader. The golden one.Jason Todd is always getting into trouble. He gets the job done, not without costs.In a Gotham where all the heroes are also trying to get by; pulling in money, respect and status where they can, can Dick convince Jason that his life is worth something more than him being a weapon?Richard doesn't like killing. Jason does what needs to be done.An alternative version of Gotham more themed around the Batfamily being a secret ‚Äòcrime‚Äô family. They run jobs to earn their wealth, whether its drug busts or transports, stealing, etc. They make an appearance to be heroes that save people, which is genuine- but to fund their ventures and control crime the way it needs to be, they do the dark alley stuff at night.

entry.title: To Die For
entry.summary:
Author: RayByAnotherName

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,462Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: One minute, he'd been minding his own business, trying to focus on guard duty and not get caught ogling the prince. The next, he'd been coughing up a lung on the shores of one of the fucking Lazarus Pits. Before he could return the court jester's dagger properly, Jason found himself being praised by the king.Something about his noble heart and selfless sacrifice?Obviously the man remembered Jason's death much differently than he did. Either way, Jason was not about to turn down a knighthood.Especially not when his favorite prince stood before him, asking him to kneel.
